title: Hello C#
description:
## In this course, you will be learning C# for a fictional company, **Aurora Anvil Studios** on their latest flagship game, Chronoshard.
Soon, you will understand everything the code below does. For now, just do what the assingment says

# Assignment:
#### The Chronoshard team needs a welcome message. replace the //Text goes here so it says "Opening Chronoshard!"
